episodes.title: From JW to freedom
episodes.description:
Jim Fielder grew up in a JW home and was with them for over 60 years, being totally immersed in all of their activities from a very young age. He eventually married and had 4 children, all involved with the JWs. A few years ago he started to visit a Christian bookshop looking for books to find illustrations for his talks he was doing - but always made sure there were no other JWs around watching before going in! 

Join Roger Carswell in conversation with Jim as he shares his experiences of all that happened through his life and his journey to freedom.. 

An Association of Evangelists (UK) production.
